description: This table contains the Home Health pre-claim review submission audit history.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: The unique contact serial number for this contact. This number is unique across all patient encounters in your system. If you use IntraConnect, this is the Unique Contact Identifier (UCI).

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the patient record for this row. This column is frequently used to link to the PATIENT table.

columns.name: EDIT_LINE
columns.description: The line number that was changed during an edit to the Pre-Claim Review. This is the line number found in column LINE of the table PRE_CLM_REV_SUBMISSIONS.

columns.name: PREV_VALUE
columns.description: The value that was changed during an edit to the Pre-Claim Review submission.

columns.name: NEW_VAL
columns.description: The new value entered during an edit to the Pre-Claim Review submission.

columns.name: EDIT_USER_ID
columns.description: The ID of the user that performed the change during an edit to the Pre-Claim Review submission.

columns.name: EDIT_DTTM
columns.description: The instant at which an edit to the Pre-Claim Review submission was made.
